channel.title: Search for video clips and sound clouds?
channel.description: Is there a way of doing a topic search through the forum so that it results in posts that have video clips or soundcloud entries ? Reason being, I remember clips etc that I have seen or heard, and when trying much later to find them, finding it nearly impossible. If there was a way of searching so it only gave results where these clips exist etc.. then would make this much easier. :thinking:

item.title: Search for video clips and sound clouds?
item.dc:creator: @lokki
item.description:
@lokki wrote:

maybe try the "i've read" button under options to decrease the number of results...

Read full topic
item.source: Search for video clips and sound clouds?

item.title: Search for video clips and sound clouds?
item.dc:creator: @Gavin Gavin
item.description:
@Gavin wrote:

It was not about something specific, it is more about items I have tried to find many times.
If you were able to do search like normal putting in a word etc.. but able to select if it has an attachment added to it or not.

Read full topic
item.source: Search for video clips and sound clouds?

item.title: Search for video clips and sound clouds?
item.dc:creator: @jaffasplaffa Mr. Grimm
item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

Yeah had the same issue many times, it can be hard to find older stuff.

What was the topic of the thing you are trying to find? that would probably make it easier to find?
